com.github.kvnxiao.jsonequals

Class JsonRoot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.kvnxiao.jsonequals.JsonRoot

  • public class JsonRoot
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing the root JSON element / file.

      • compareTo

        public JsonCompareResult compareTo(JsonRoot other,
                                   java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ignoreFields,
                                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> pruneFields)
        Compares this JsonRoot with another JsonRoot object. Checks for deep-equality, with optionally provided fields to ignore from comparison, and "stale" fields to prune and remove before comparison.
        Parameters:
        other - The other JsonRoot to compare to
        ignoreFields - Optional JSON fields to ignore from the comparison
        pruneFields - Optional JSON fields to prune before comparison
        Returns:
        The json comparison result
